Species traits and classifications important to society

Source: R/data.R
species_traits.Rd

You can query on the values shown here

Usage

species_traits

Format

A data frame with 32 rows and 4 variables:

category

traits or important to society

group

subclategory

selection

value of functional group or classification important to society

selectid

ignore - used internally to retrieve data from EurOBIS using WFS
